channel.title: Smithing [Delta]
channel.description:
I've just downloaded a clean deltascape source, but the smithing doesn't work very well.
When you use a bar on a anvil, it just smiths some gold. No interface or something.
Does anybody know how to or can give me a tutorial on how to add normal smithing?
